title: Medieval Music Pack Volume 2
description: A medieval music pack containing loopable tracks and short ident clips
longDescription:
The second volume in a collection of medieval and fantasy style music. This collection contains 20 original music tracks. These tracks are ideal for recreating the mood and sounds of the middle ages. The tracks feature various instruments including flutes, recorders, pipes, guitars, harp, harpsichord, and percussion.


Preview: https://soundcloud.com/david-dumais-687079117/medieval-music-pack-vol-2-preview
